game.name: BaalHexo
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A hex-based strategy game of pure tactics. Outposition your opponents, conquer boss battles, and create your own challenges with the built-in level editor.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A hex-based strategy game of pure tactics. Outposition your opponents, conquer boss battles, and create your own challenges with the built-in level editor.
